bibl.title: Classical and Biblical Culture in Late Antique Egypt. Some Notes.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: 1. P. Gen. IV, 159: An enkomion on a deceased person? - 2. ἐξ ὀδόντων ἀδίκων: An allusion to Job in P. Cairo Masp. I, 67002. - 3. The προσύναξις of the holy God-bearer: S.B. XVIII, 13272 [= P. Berol. Inv. 7884]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 145.4 P. Berol. Inv. 7884 P. Cairo Masp. I, 67002 P. Gen. IV, 159
Lajos Berkes, Classical and Biblical Culture in Late Antique Egypt. Some Notes.

1. P. Gen. IV, 159: An enkomion on a deceased person? - 2. ἐξ ὀδόντων ἀδίκων: An allusion to Job in P. Cairo Masp. I, 67002. - 3. The προσύναξις of the holy God-bearer: S.B. XVIII, 13272 [= P. Berol. Inv. 7884]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
